name: combo ninja final
description:
feedback form:

https://forms.gle/D6EWxTTzqRLLzhUA9

controls:

A,D - left, right

W - jump

S - down

space - big jump

shift - sprint

E - heal

W + W - double jump

mouse(left) - sword

mouse(right) - shuriken

mouse(right) + shift - tri shot shuriken

enemies:

mushroom, gem, plant

green soldier shooting fireball

alien shooting fire ball(mini boss)

UFO shooting fireball(boss)

objective:

complete each level by going through the portal

4 levels total
